title: 4th Phase of Api Wenuwen Api Houses hand over to war veterans
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma (Pix by: Sudath Silva) The fourth phase of the Api Wenuven Api Housing Project launched by the Ministry of Defence was ceremonially held in Monaragala and Badulla Districts on 25 June 2011. President Mahinda Rajapaksa graced the occasion as the Chief Guest and handed over the keys of the…
